title: Riot, it would be an Honour for my 1000th Win
body: If I could maybe get an opportunity to play with some of you guys on my team. I know you guys are very busy, but It has been a long journey to 1000, and I would love if this could happen.

replies.body:
Hey dude!

Add me in game i'll play! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gynQrVid,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-07T01:41:21.797+0000)
>
> Hey dude!
> 
> Add me in game i'll play! :)

Oh hi there Sephyre!
Awesome I'll send it through now.
What about my 2400th win or so :')

> [{quoted}](name=RoflJoker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gynQrVid,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-07T12:02:53.840+0000)
>
> What about my 2400th win or so :')

I plan to ask Riot to join me for my 458th win.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gynQrVid,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-01-07T12:05:02.960+0000)
>
> I plan to ask Riot to join me for my 458th win.

We all start somewhere ^^
Good luck bro. Have a great 1000th win, hopefully they play with you.
